mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO itemAttach (itemAttachNum, itemAttachParentsNum, itemAttachName, itemAttachFileSize, itemAttachFileContentType) VALUES
(NULL, #{Item.itemAttachParentsNum}, #{Item.itemAttachName}, #{Item.itemAttachFileSize}, #{Item.itemAttachFileContentType} )
mapper.select: SELECT b.itemNum itemNum, goods, price, purchaseCnt, CartCnt, category, explains, hashtag, inventory, GROUP_CONCAT(a.itemAttachNum) fnums, GROUP_CONCAT(itemAttachParentsNum) pnums, GROUP_CONCAT(itemAttachName) fnames, GROUP_CONCAT(itemAttachFileSize) fsizes, GROUP_CONCAT(itemAttachFileContentType) contenttypes FROM item b LEFT OUTER JOIN itemAttach a ON b.itemNum=a.itemAttachParentsNum GROUP BY b.itemNum ORDER BY b.itemNum DESC

SELECT b.itemNum itemNum, goods, price, purchaseCnt, CartCnt, category, explains, hashtag, inventory, GROUP_CONCAT(a.itemAttachNum) fnums, GROUP_CONCAT(itemAttachParentsNum) pnums, GROUP_CONCAT(itemAttachName) fnames, GROUP_CONCAT(itemAttachFileSize) fsizes, GROUP_CONCAT(itemAttachFileContentType) contenttypes FROM item b LEFT OUTER JOIN itemAttach a ON b.itemNum=a.itemAttachParentsNum WHERE category = #{category} GROUP BY b.itemNum ORDER BY b.itemNum DESC

SELECT b.itemNum itemNum, goods, price, purchaseCnt, CartCnt, category, explains, hashtag, inventory, GROUP_CONCAT(a.itemAttachNum) fnums, GROUP_CONCAT(itemAttachParentsNum) pnums, GROUP_CONCAT(itemAttachName) fnames, GROUP_CONCAT(itemAttachFileSize) fsizes, GROUP_CONCAT(itemAttachFileContentType) contenttypes FROM item b LEFT OUTER JOIN itemAttach a ON b.itemNum=a.itemAttachParentsNum WHERE b.itemNum=#{itemNum} GROUP BY b.itemNum
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET goods=#{goods}, price=#{price}, explains=#{explains} WHERE itemNum=#{itemNum}
mapper.select: SELECT i.itemNum, i.goods, i.price, i.purchaseCnt, i.cartCnt, i.category, i.explains, i.inventory, i.option1, i.option2, group_concat(a.itemAttachNum) inums, group_concat(a.itemAttachName) inames, group_concat(a.itemAttachParentsNum)ipnums, group_concat(itemAttachFileSize) ifsizes, group_concat(itemAttachFileContentType) icontenttypes FROM item i LEFT OUTER JOIN itemAttach a ON i.itemNum = a.itemAttachParentsNum GROUP BY i.itemNum ORDER BY purchaseCnt DESC LIMIT 10
